column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE CAPTURED THE VILLAGE. SEND SOME BACKUP. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. RUSSIAN REINFORCEMENTS ARE DEFEATED. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. WE ARE YOUR BACKUP. SETTING UP DEFENSIVE POSITIONS. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. ROGER THAT. BACKUP INBOUND. STAY PUT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. KEEP THE OBJECTIVE SECURED. SOME MOVEMENT DETECTED NORTH WEST. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. COPY. YOUR MISSION IS NOW ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
